title: Double Shot (1R38)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Archery: Spot an Elf archer companion to make the fellowship archery total +1.
Lore:	“The affray was sharp, but the orcs were dismayed by the fierceness of the defence. Legolas shot two through the throat.”
Rarity:	R
